text: Ogaada, hubaal cibaado oo dhan barax tiran1 aan waxba lala wadaajin cid kale waxaa Xaq u leh Allaah (Keliya). Oo (ma xagga) kuwa yeesha awliyo ay la barbar caabudaan Isaga, (iyagoo leh): Uma caabudno waxaan ahayn inay noo dhoweeyaan Allaah dhowaansho aad ah. Hubaal Allaah baa ku kala xukumi doona dhexdooda waxa ay isku khilaafaan. Hubaal Allaah ma hanuuniyo kan isagu ah beenaale, abaal laawe
